name: macOS BigSur Inspired Twitter Icon
description:
Hey there!

I like to test vector tools to experiment with shadows, inner shadows, glows and layers and get this faux 3D icons style. Big Sur approach to icons is really refreshing. I love all the details that went in making all the new icons (except the QuickTime one - that one's awful).


I released the Figma file publicly so you can see how I made this one and maybe create your own icon. 


For this one, I wanted to give the feeling of the logo splashed inside a blue squishy pool, sinking into it but not much since the liquid is pretty solid, like gum.


Did I achieve that? Any hints on how to step up that 3D game?


You can see more on my Dribbble account, GitHub profile or let's talk about design + business + ethics + inclusivity on Twitter!
